name: diplomatic
description: Perform a hostage trade.

name: cheney
description: Defeat a Bulldozer with a shotgun.

name: intimidating
description: Get a Heavy SWAT to give up.

name: left_for_dead
description: Finish a heist in custody while all your team mates are alive. (4 teammates).

name: blood_in_blood_out
description: Trade all the butchers in SLAUGHTERHOUSE. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: duck_hunting
description: Complete the GREEN BRIDGE on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: dodge_this
description: Beat a heist on normal difficulty or above, having killed a Bulldozer without taking damage from any Bulldozer. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: car_drop
description: Get the armored car to drop without shooting at it in SLAUGHTERHOUSE. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: last_man_standing
description: Beat a heist after having been the only one alive. (4 teammates).

name: windowlicker
description: Defeat a law enforcer planting C4 in FIRST WORLD BANK on hard difficulty or above. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: civil_disobedience
description: Defeat 100 law enforcers in a single heist.

name: more_than_two
description: Find ten money bundles in PANIC ROOM.

name: cant_hide
displayName: You can run but you can't hide
description: In PANIC ROOM, take the key from Chavez within the first 45 seconds of starting the mission. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: shinobi
description: Bypassing all 3 consoles before raising the alarm, beat DIAMOND HEIST on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: sapphires
description: Steal all the sapphires in DIAMOND HEIST on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: take_gold
description: Beat SLAUGHTERHOUSE within 15 minutes, taking all the gold. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: stand_together
description: Beat HEAT STREET on normal difficulty or above without anyone getting downed. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: quick_draw
description: In PANIC ROOM, kill all armed thugs in and around the apartment building within 60 seconds of you and your crew drawing your weapons. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: no_photos
description: Destroy all the cameras in FIRST WORLD BANK within 10 seconds of drawing your weapons. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: hot_lava
description: Don't let any law enforcers reach the graffiti on the center of the roof in PANIC ROOM from the SECURE THE ROOF objective until the ESCAPE objective on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: federal_crime
description: Defeat 25 FBI agents in a row.

name: one_shot_one_kill_repeat
description: Get 30 kills using 30 shots, using only the M308 Rifle.

name: bomb_man
description: In DIAMOND HEIST, defeat all twelve Patrol Guards using only trip mines. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: ready_yet
description: In DIAMOND HEIST, get Bain to come back for you at least 7 times on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: payday
description: Aquire one billion dollars in total cash. One. BILLION. Dollars.

name: cant_touch
description: Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL difficulty, with your group accuracy being at 60% or higher. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: dozen_angry_men
displayName: I pushed the button and lived!
description: In DIAMOND HEIST, get the big diamond and escape on OVERKILL difficulty with you and all your team mates alive. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: noob_herder
description: Beat any heist on OVERKILL difficulty with three other players who are all using the Noob Lube perk. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: lose_face
description: Beat all heists on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: eagle_eyes
description: Point out a special enemy using the "shout out" command.

name: aint_afraid
description: Gain a level in the Assault tree during an assault.

name: crack_bang
description: Gain a level in the Sharpshooter tree with your last kill being a Sniper.

name: lay_on_hands
description: Gain a level in the Support tree while reviving a teammate.

name: darkness
description: On GREEN BRIDGE, destroy all the lights in the main scaffolding tower. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: christmas_present
description: In multiplayer, find a Christmas present in any heist.

name: golden_boy
displayName: You are GOLDEN! OVERKILL salutes you!
description: Beat all heists on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty and show them all you are on top! Completing this will make you golden!

name: president
description: Reach level 145. This gives you the presidential masks for further campaigning.

name: bank_145
description: Beat FIRST WORLD BANK on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: street_145
description: Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: bridge_145
description: Beat GREEN BRIDGE on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: apartment_145
description: Beat PANIC ROOM on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: slaughter_house_145
displayName: Lots of pigs, but no pigs
description: Beat SLAUGHTERHOUSE on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: diamond_heist_145
description: Beat DIAMOND HEIST on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: crowd_control
description: Beat COUNTERFEIT without letting any hostage escape or die. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: quick_hands
description: On COUNTERFEIT, manage to defuse all C4 charges.

name: pacifist
description: Beat COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty or above without killing any law enforcers or civilians. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: blow_out
description: Beat UNDERCOVER with everyone in the crew only using the GL40. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start. Using melee does not count towards this challenge!

name: saviour
description: On UNDERCOVER, place 20 planks by yourself on windows, vents or fences.

name: det_gadget
description: Beat any heist using the STRYK Pistol, AK Rifle, GL40 Grenade Launcher, Toolkit upgrade, Sentry Gun equipment and Big Game Hunters crew bonus. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: suburbia_145
description: Complete COUNTERFEIT on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty.

name: secret_stash_145
displayName: In for a dime, in for a dollar
description: Complete UNDERCOVER on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty.

name: dont_panic
description: Complete NO MERCY on hard or OVERKILL without any civilian raising the alarm. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: cut_wire
description: In NO MERCY, cut the correct wire opening the ICU door security system. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: wrong_door
description: Complete NO MERCY on OVERKILL difficulty, having sawed open all three ICU security doors. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: afraid_of_the_dark
description: Beat NO MERCY on hard or above, getting the power back up within 5 seconds of it being shut down. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.

name: tester
description: Solve the PAYDAY SECRET on any difficulty with any mask and gain access to the OVERVAULT. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
